Emerging growth company&#8194; &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&#160;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&#8194;&#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; Item&#8201;8.01. Other Events. On April&#160;10, 2025, JPMorgan Chase&#160;&amp; Co. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission a prospectus supplement dated April&#160;10, 2025 (the &#8220;Prospectus Supplement&#8221;) related to the JPMorgan Chase&#160;&amp; Co. Dividend Reinvestment Plan (the &#8220;Plan&#8221;). In connection with the filing of the Prospectus Supplement, Morgan, Lewis&#160;&amp; Bockius LLP delivered a legality opinion, a copy of which is attached hereto as Exhibit 5.1, with respect to the shares of common stock, par value $1.00 per share, of the Company that may be offered and sold from time to time under the Plan. &#160; Item&#8201;9.01.
